Music

I am also a Western Classical Pianist. I have been playing for over 4 years and have cleared the 8th and final level of the Trinity College London Piano Music Examinations. This is something that I started learning on my own initially and after discovering that I have quite a flair for it, began to take professional training for about 3 years. Haven't been able to play much after my taking up my Graduate course but I intend to jump back to it in the future. Music is something that I'm really passionate about and have put in a lot of hours to try and perfect. Below are a few videos of mine, hope you enjoy!

Fantasie Impromptu - Chopin
Super Mario Theme
The Simpsons Theme
Fig Leaf Rag - Scott Joplin
Maple Leaf Rag - Scott Joplin
